message.body: Holy crap these cookies look amazing. I can't believe you sent us these. You are a horrible person, by which I mean I love you thank you very very very very very much!!
I love you, too and you are very welcome! It actually took longer to get them to ###### folks than our ####/############## peeps, oddly.
Also, I was obviously looking at Martha Stewart cookie porn before my sister and i started the project
I already sent a message to ###### telling her about them so I can't eat them all in secret before she finds out
Hahaha, you're a better person than me
Oh that reminds me, I made a new biscotti you might like. Want the recipe? Or are you not into biscotti-making?
Yes, that would be great, I need something to serve Christmas morning
Thanks, looks great and I have a ton of shelled pistachios left from thanksgiving
One of the grad students literally wrestled a bag of it out of my hand. Then again, grad students eat anything, so maybe that doesn't mean much.
Oh my God, you are an evil woman. Those croissant things are AMAZING.
They are a pain in the ass to make
